author: jzabroski
body: Only lists PowerShell 6.2; does not list 6.2.1

comments.author: jzabroski
comments.body: @iSazonov - @msftbot is somewhat lying to me.  CHANGELOG.md and releases are not in sync.  Poignantly, I expect master branch CHANGELOG.md to contain the rolling changelog across all releases, so you can easily grep it and/or scroll to see what changes impact you as you upgrade.

title: CHANGELOG out of date
